00013 bool validEntityName(string name) {
00014         if(!name.length())
00015                 return false;
00016         if(name[0] > '0' && name[0] < '9')
00017                 return false;
00018         return std::strspn(name.c_str(), "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890_") == name.length();
00019 }
